entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet publish does not support DotNetPublishFiles #35581
  • Microsoft.NET.RuntimeIdentifierInference.targets incorrectly sets RID to win7-x86 / win7-x64 #35575
  • [8.0.100-rc.2.23469.4] some deprecated global tools get NuGetPackageNotFoundException when installing #35566
  • [Bug]: ProjectReference not transitive during "Pack" on multi-targeted project #35567

PullRequests

Created

  • Update to 9.0 version of targeting pack #35601
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Skip getting Windows GUI bit on non-Windows in AppHostShellShimMaker #35600
    untriaged, Area-CLI, 8.0.1xx
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Adjust trim/aot warning messages (#35186) #35595
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • We don't need this 🙃 #35594
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add AOT test for CopyOutputSymbolsToPublishDirectory #35593
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2272651 #35586
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use MicrosoftAspNetCoreComponentsSdkAnalyzersPackageVersion for aspnetcore version #35572
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Use MicrosoftAspNetCoreComponentsSdkAnalyzersPackageVersion for aspnetcore version #35571
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Add Microsoft.NET.Workload.Emscripten.Current.Manifest-9.0.100 as a dependency #35570
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Add Microsoft.NET.Workload.Emscripten.Current.Manifest-8.0.100 as a dependency #35569
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow

Merged

  • [main] Update dotnet/runtime #35048
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow

Updated

  • Meaningful error on runtime identifier mismatch in project.assets.json #35491
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Rtm Branding #35538
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • WIP: Add name argument for dotnet new #33810
    untriaged, Area-Templates
  • Make NETSDK1083 link to RID doc #35546
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [wasm] Remove `UsingMicrosoftNETSdkBlazorWebAssembly` from Wasm SDK #34166
    untriaged, Area-WasmSdk
  • Create project templates target to 9.0 #34996
    untriaged, Area-Common templates
  • Update the sdk target to net9.0 #35031
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Container Build: Add OCI Archive Format writing #35204
    untriaged, Area-Containers
